newsitem.title: UK: TABLE-Ferguson returns to full-year profit.
newsitem.headline: TABLE-Ferguson returns to full-year profit.

text.p: NOTE - Unadjusted earnings per share were 17.4 pence compared with a loss of 11.9 pence the previous year. Turnover including discontinued operations was 153.9 million stg vs 206.4 million stg previously.

Ferguson International Holdings Plc, whose core business is the manufacture of labels, intends to change its name to Ferguson Internatonal Plc -- a resolution will be put to shareholders at the AGM on July 2.

"1997/98, which has begun satisfactorily with sales ahead of last year although margins continue under pressure, will be the first full year for the company as a focused label producer and should therefore set a clear base level for future growth prospects," chairman Denis Cassidy said in a statement.
